title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.180 - Premises
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.180 - Premises

State Regulations
(a) Mobile food service establishments and all parts of the property used in connection with operations of the establishment are to be kept clean and free from litter. (b) Only articles necessary to the operation and maintenance of the mobile food service establishment are to be in the establishment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.180

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
